document.full_text: the arkansas house of representatives has left two precincts unattached to their newly drawn congressional districts, a mistake that is keeping the state legislature in session for an extra day.
document.title: redistricting error keeps arkansas legislature in session
lines_and_colors: the arkansas house of representatives has left two precincts unattached to their newly drawn congressional districts, a mistake that is keeping the state legislature in session for an extra day.
